text: Syarhey Maryanavich Lagutko (; born 23 May 1970) is a former Belarusian football player. He also played futsal professionally, winning many Belarus trophies and titles in that sport. ==External links== * Category:1970 births Category:Sportspeople from Minsk Category:Living people Category:Belarusian footballers Category:FC Orsha players Category:Belarusian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Krylia Sovetov Samara players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC BATE Borisov players Category:FC Neman Grodno players Category:FC Darida Minsk Raion players Category:FC Rudziensk players Category:FC Veras Nesvizh players Category:Belarusian men's futsal players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Syarhey Lagutko
